script.dataSelect: select table_name as name, table_catalog as catalog_name, table_schema as schema_name from information_schema.tables
script.templatesSelect: select column_type, (case is_nullable when 'YES' then 'true' else 'false' end) as nullable, column_name, column_default from information_schema.columns where table_name='$name$' and table_schema='$schema_name$'
